articles.title: Air France-KLM flags financial hit from tourists avoiding Paris Olympics - Financial Times
articles.description: Airline says traffic to and from French capital is behind other European cities in run-up to games
articles.content:
Air France-KLM has warned it expects to take a financial hit because a significant number of would-be visitors have avoided booking trips to Paris during the Olympic Games.

articles.author: Patrick Frater
articles.title: Netflix and Amazon Dominate Commissioning by Streamers, Tilting the Content Market Away From U.S., Towards Local: Study - Variety
articles.description: A new study shows Netflix and Amazon dominating original commissioning by streamers and how they are tilting the market towards local content.
articles.content:
Netflix and Amazon returned to dominance in commissioning of original content worldwide in the first quarter of this year, according to research and consultancy firm Ampere Analysis.

articles.title: Project Nexus completes comprehensive blueprint for connecting domestic instant payment systems globally and prepares for work towards live implementation - bis.org
articles.description:
Nexus is a BIS Innovation Hub project that seeks to enhance cross-border payments by connecting multiple domestic instant payment systems (IPS) globally.
It is the first BIS Innovation Hub project in the payments area to move towards live implementation. BIS…
